name: Assemblage
description:
Walk around the beach picking up stuff washed up by the sea, then make little sculptures with it.

WASD to move, mouse to look around. Click to pick stuff up.
Spacebar to open/close creator-mode. WASD to rotate selected piece.

The share button is broken.

Code and design: ricoalbe
Art: ricozalejandro
Additional code: jfcampos
Music: gemaruizruiz

Inspired by the lovely work of Luis Cruz Suero

Slow game jam entry.
